channel.title: Advancedscape
channel.description:
With 100% permission from the original owner of Advancedscape ~ Rog3r, I have bought Advancedscape back! I was a previous member of his staff and I wanted to bring it back and make it better. The server is released to the public, it is a great way to get feedback on updates.
What I have done: Removed Trade Duplication ~ 100% [IMG]http://i546.photobucket.com/albums/hh417/Runescapecomunity/antidupe.jpg[/img] Known Bugs: If you mass click an item, you get the report message.
Lowered skills maximum level from 125 to 99. Known Bugs: Level 99 isn't 13M Exp. BUG SORTED!
Every Skillcape [IMG]http://i546.photobucket.com/albums/hh417/Runescapecomunity/allcapes.jpg[/img] Known Bugs: Haven't sorted out level requirements and the wield slots YET. SORTED!
What I want to do: Fix up the skills, make them much more realistic. Fix the Skill Exp. DONE Add various different quests and clean up previous quests. 100% Player/NPC Dialogue. Fix Server Nulling. 5% Working skill tabs. 100% Godswords (GS Making, Weilding stances and special stances)
More to come soon, will update often!

item.title: Advancedscape
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

[quote=“Davebart, post:4, topic:316176”]Very nice work, is the server stable?

How much work do you have to do?[/quote]
A load more work, it nulls a bit.

The Soul:

It wasn’t good enough to bring back just so you know.

Your opinion

[quote=“Deathspirit, post:6, topic:316176”][quote author=krazy karl link=topic=412753.msg3042030#msg3042030 date=1259184909]
It shows up in a mod box so it notifies all members of staff online
[/quote]Ah i see that’s nice then…[/quote]

Thanks

zyle1992:

Remove the advertising in your first picture.

Sorry forgot it was there, will do

Read full topic

item.title: Advancedscape
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

With 100% permission from the original owner of Advancedscape ~ Rog3r, I have bought Advancedscape back! I was a previous member of his staff and I wanted to bring it back and make it better. The server is released to the public, it is a great way to get feedback on updates.

What I have done:
Removed Trade Duplication ~ 100%

Known Bugs: If you mass click an item, you get the report message.

Lowered skills maximum level from 125 to 99.
Known Bugs: Level 99 isn’t 13M Exp. BUG SORTED!

Every Skillcape

Known Bugs: Haven’t sorted out level requirements and the wield slots YET. SORTED!

What I want to do:
Fix up the skills, make them much more realistic.
Fix the Skill Exp. DONE
Add various different quests and clean up previous quests.
100% Player/NPC Dialogue.
Fix Server Nulling. 5%
Working skill tabs.
100% Godswords (GS Making, Weilding stances and special stances)

More to come soon, will update often!

Read full topic
